title: Reframing the Purpose of the War

content.prompt: Lincoln’s rhetoric in the excerpt would most likely have been interpreted as promoting which of the following arguments?

choices.label: Allowing slavery to exist was still a political option.
Maintaining the blockade of Southern states was difficult.
Changing the purpose of the war would strengthen the Union cause.
Achieving the Confederacy’s unconditional surrender was the Union’s main objective.

topic.text: 5.9: Government Policies During the Civil War
